title: Bread Bee's list of current major problems
body:
-Juggernauts
-Kalista autoing while being CC'd
-Slow and mediocre banning system for intentional feeding and trolling
-Nothing to use IP on after buying all the champions/runes
-Chromas cost RP
-{{champion:131}} 
-Currently about 15% champions have a large advantage over the other 85%
